SA05rahppspu:3: yā tvaṃ sarvānavadyāṅgi niravadyair nirīkṣyase // RahPps_1 //
SA05rahppspu:5: yas tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam // RahPps_2 //
SA05rahppspu:6: tava cārye guṇāḍhyāyā buddhasya ca jagadguroḥ /
SA05rahppspu:7: na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś candracandrikayor iva // RahPps_3 //
SA05rahppspu:10: sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate /
SA05rahppspu:13: poṣikā janayitrī ca mātā tvam asi vatsalā // RahPps_6 //
SA05rahppspu:14: yad buddhā lokaguravaḥ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ /
SA05rahppspu:15: tena tvam api kalyāṇi sarvasattvapitāmahī // RahPps_7 //
SA05rahppspu:18: vineyaṃ janam āsādya tatra tatra tathāgataiḥ /
SA05rahppspu:19: bahurūpā tvam evaikā nānānāmabhir īḍyase // RahPps_9 //
SA05rahppspu:21: tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti doṣā vādāś ca vādinām // RahPps_10 //
SA05rahppspu:24: yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas tvannāthasya na vidyate /
SA05rahppspu:25: tasyāmba katham anyatra rāgadveṣau bhaviṣyataḥ // RahPps_12 //
SA05rahppspu:26: nāgacchasi kutaś cit tvaṃ na ca kva cana gacchasi /
SA05rahppspu:27: sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhir nopalabhyase // RahPps_13 //
SA05rahppspu:28: ye tvām evaṃ na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ /
SA05rahppspu:29: prapadya ca vimucyante tad idaṃ mahad adbhutam // RahPps_14 //
SA05rahppspu:30: tvām eva badhyate paśyann apaśyann api badhyate /
SA05rahppspu:31: tvām eva mucyate paśyann apaśyann api mucyate // RahPps_15 //
SA05rahppspu:33: sudurbodhāsi māyeva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase // RahPps_16 //
SA05rahppspu:34: buddhaiḥ pratyekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā /
SA05rahppspu:35: mārgas tvam ekā mokṣasya nāsty anya iti niścayaḥ // RahPps_17 //
SA05rahppspu:37: kṛpayā lokanāthais tvam ucyase ca na cocyase // RahPps_18 //
SA05rahppspu:38: śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām /
SA05rahppspu:39: sarvavāgviśayātītāṃ yā tvaṃ kva cid aniśritā // RahPps_19 //
SA05rahppspu:40: saty evam api saṃvṛtyā vākpathair vayam īdṛśaiḥ /
SA05rahppspu:41: tvām astutyām api satīṃ tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāḥ // RahPps_20 //
SA05rahppspu:43: tenāstv āśu jagat kṛtsnaṃ prajñāpāraparāyaṇam // RahPps_21 //
